title: Dietician & Plant Based Influencer Ellie Bullen (@elsas_wholesomelife) Shares Her Journey
description:
Episode 10 of the Plant Proof podcast talking life with Ellie Bullen (@elsas_wholesomelife) In this episode: Hear about Ellie's upbringing including her relationship with her twin sister Lauren (Gypsea_Lust) Hear about Ellie's time in the Army Learn about why Ellie moved to a plant based diet Learn about how Ellie has grown her online social community on Instagram Hear some of Ellie's top tips for transitioning to a plant based diet and learn more about her website and cook book Plus much more insight into the life behind one of the the largest health & wellness influencers online. Play now: REVIEW/SHARE: If you enjoyed the episode and have a spare 1-2 minutes please leave a review on iTunes so the Plant Proof podcast ranks higher and becomes more discoverable for other listeners. And if you have any friends that you think will benefit from listening to this episode or any of the other Plant Proof episodes please share the link - together we can make this world a healthier place. WHERE TO LISTEN TO THE PLANT PROOF PODCAST? Currently the Plant Proof podcast can be listened to on iTunes, Google Play, Stitcher, Soundcloud or on the Plantproof.com directly (this page). In the near future it will also be made available on Spotify . If you listen on iTunes be sure to hit 'subscribe' so you are instantly notified when I release new episodes. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
